attributes.action: To make it that all peadophiles have to serve the full sentence they were given
attributes.background: These people are a danger to children and always will be as they can not be rehabilitated so the longer they are in prison the longer children will be safe from them please sign as the damage they cause lasts a lifetime so a halfed sentence is no where near good enough

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The term "paedophile" is used to describe people who have been convicted of a variety of different criminal offences. We're not sure which crimes you would like to be included.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
